long_description: Mile after mile, the Nathan Triangle Hydration waist pack keeps hydration close at hand, and offers stable carry of your running essentials. 22 fl. oz. water bottle stows in a insulated, angled pocket for easy access. Padded, moisture-wicking back panel helps keep your back comfortable during a high-octane workout. Zippered pocket securely stores small essentials and features a key clip. Includes a waterproof medical/ID card. Reflective details for visibility in low light. Nathan Triangle Hydration waist pack fits 26 - 44 in. waists.
short_description: Mile after mile, the Nathan Triangle Hydration waist pack keeps hydration close at hand, and offers stable carry of your running essentials.
